text: @JackM_DCFC Hi, your vehicle is showing on ship to the UK and due to arrive any time. We'll check it for you tomorrow to see if it's docked.
@samhoulden Hi Sam, Apple CarPlay is a feature within App-Connect, this is a factory cost option, that at the moment can't be retro-fit.
@bungleaio Hi, we can do better than that, your new car is at the Retailer! How #superexcited are you now?
@hondaR13 Hi, your new car is at build stage 8 of 8. It won't be long before you're in your new ride. Exciting times!
@hondaR13 Hi, there's no need to worry, the tracker can take a few days to update.
@Oldagepension We do apologise for the spelling error Sallie. If you would like to speak with us, let us know and we'll arrange a call back.

@mannyloi Hi Manuel, you car is still at port waiting to be shipped to the UK, and as yet it has not been allocated a ship.
@aduffaloo Good news, Christmas has come early, your new car is at the Retailer! Give them a call to discuss a delivery date. Exciting!
@JonoNC Hi Jonathan, have you asked for a break-down of costs? It's likely this will include the labour charges for taking the bumper apart.
